price: 42. Cagalah katayyuu kee digaalá elle tanim sinam yadlumeeh, baaxô bagul cakki maliinoh caddok tatra тага umaanet, woo mari qansarissa digaalá-le qhiyaamah ayró.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَظۡلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبۡغُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā al-sabīlu ʿalā alladhīna yaẓlimūna al-nāsa wayabghūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi ulāika lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
